title: Level 1: CAN Bus Signal Decoder
description:
You're working on automotive diagnostics software. Parse this CAN message and extract the vehicle speed.

CAN Message: {{input}}

The speed is encoded in bytes 3-4 (big-endian, unit: 0.01 km/h).
What is the vehicle speed in km/h?
hint: CAN messages are in hexadecimal. Convert bytes 3-4 to decimal, then multiply by 0.01 to get km/h.
